Sentencas: Mixed electronic and ionic conductivity (MIEC) perovskite oxides hold promise as cathode with high oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) activity for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) operating at reduced temperatures.
Titulo: Microwave plasma rapid heating towards robust cathode/electrolyte interface for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, these MIEC cathodes usually contain lanthanide or alkaline-earth elements at A-site.
Titulo: Microwave plasma rapid heating towards robust cathode/electrolyte interface for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These elements tend to interact with yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte (YSZ) to form unwanted phases such as La2Zr2O7 and SrZrO3 at conventional electrode fabrication conditions (>800 degrees C).
Titulo: Microwave plasma rapid heating towards robust cathode/electrolyte interface for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Such unwanted interfacial reaction severely degrades the cell performance.
Titulo: Microwave plasma rapid heating towards robust cathode/electrolyte interface for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: We present a new method to assemble SrCo0.4Fe0.5W0.1O3-delta (SCFW) directly onto YSZ by a highly efficient microwave plasma technique.
Titulo: Microwave plasma rapid heating towards robust cathode/electrolyte interface for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Intimate contact between SCFW and YSZ phases can be achieved by ten-minute microwave-plasma treatment with no new phase formation.
Titulo: Microwave plasma rapid heating towards robust cathode/electrolyte interface for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Consequently, the microwave-plasma fabricated interface exhibits a notably high ORR performance, showing an area-specific resistances of 0.11 Omega cm(2) at 600 degrees C, about two orders of magnitude better than the equivalent prepared via the conventional method.
Titulo: Microwave plasma rapid heating towards robust cathode/electrolyte interface for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Our method is also effective in assembling other MIEC perovskite cathodes such as SrCo0.5Fe0.5O3-delta and SrCo0.8Nb0.1Ta0.1O3-delta on YSZ electrolyte, achieving notable enhancement of the cathode performance.
Titulo: Microwave plasma rapid heating towards robust cathode/electrolyte interface for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study thus provides an effective and convenient method for synthesizing reactive and robust interfaces between two incompatible phases with minimized interphase interactions.
Titulo: Microwave plasma rapid heating towards robust cathode/electrolyte interface for solid oxide fuel cells
Microwave plasma rapid heating towards robust cathode/electrolyte interface for solid oxide fuel cells
